sentences.en: Cheniers have a parallel , gently arcuate alignment reflecting the migratory history of the shoreline.
sentences.cn: 沙脊呈平行的 、 微弓形排列,这能反映滨线迁移的历史.

sentences.en: He was flying over a sea, toward a jagged shoreline.
sentences.cn: 他越过一片大海, 向弯弯曲曲的海岸线飞去.

sentences.en: Prograding bar - finger sand bodies are over - ridden by distributary channels as the shoreline retreats.
sentences.cn: 当海岸线后退时,向海推进的指状沙坝被分流河道所覆盖.
这个海湾 1.3 万公里的海岸线

sentences.en: The erosive effect of ocean waves on the shoreline.
sentences.cn: 海浪对海岸线的侵蚀效果.

sentences.en: The lake has several miles of shoreline.
sentences.cn: 这个湖有好几英里的湖岸线.

sentences.en: The laminae may appear especially even and parallel in sections parallel to the shoreline.
sentences.cn: 在平行于滨线的剖面上,薄层显得尤为平整.

sentences.en: The road follows the shoreline for a few miles.
sentences.cn: 公路沿海岸线逶迤而行几英里。

sentences.en: The shoreline could be dimly seen.
The shoreline regressed in response to the situation.
sentences.cn: 滨线退到相应的位置上.

sentences.en: The shoreline was made up of a jumble of huge boulders.
sentences.cn: 海岸线上堆着一大堆杂乱的巨石。

sentences.en: The water gnaws at the shoreline.
These shoreline trends are completely independent of the present - day structural configuration of the San Juan basin.
sentences.cn: 这些滨线的走向与现今圣胡安盆地的构造形象是完全不同的.

sentences.en: Though the shoreline could be dimly seen, it was impossible to judge how far away it was.
sentences.cn: 虽然能够隐隐约约看到海岸线，但无法估计出大概有多远。

sentences.en: Tilting, warping, and changes in elevation can seriously affect canals and shoreline facilities of various kinks.
sentences.cn: 倾斜 、 翘曲和高程变化可以严重地影响水渠和各种岸边设备.

trans.tran_cn: 海岸线，岸边线，滨线，水线
trans.tran_en: the land along the edge of a large area of water such as an ocean or lake
